# a\(n\) \= n\! \- n^2 \+ 2n \- 1\.
https://oeis.org/A372264

## Python
```Python
from math import factorial
def A372264(n): return factorial(n)-(n-1)**2 # _Chai Wah Wu_, May 02 2024
```
